mapper.select: select sku_id, group_concat(sale_attr_value_id order by base_sale_attr_id separator '|') value_ids from sku_sale_attr_value sav inner join spu_sale_attr_value ssav on ssav.id = sav.sale_attr_value_id and sav.is_deleted = 0 and ssav.is_deleted =0 where sav.spu_id = #{spuId} group by sku_id
